member.name: IDWriteTextAnalysisSource.GetLocaleName
member.summary: Gets the locale name on the range affected by the text analysis.
member.param: Contains the length of the text being affected by the text analysis up to the next differing locale.
Contains an address of a pointer to an array of characters which receives the locale name from the text affected by the text analysis. The array of characters is null-terminated.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteTextAnalysisSource.GetNumberSubstitution
member.summary: Gets the number substitution from the text range affected by the text analysis.
member.param: The starting position from which to report.
Contains the length of the text, in characters, remaining in the text range up to the next differing number substitution.
Contains an address of a pointer to an object, which was created with , that holds the appropriate digits and numeric punctuation for a given locale.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteTextAnalysisSource.GetParagraphReadingDirection
member.returns: The reading direction of the current paragraph.

member.name: IDWriteTextAnalysisSource.GetTextAtPosition
member.summary: Gets a block of text starting at the specified text position.
member.param: The first position of the piece to obtain. All positions are in UTF16 code units, not whole characters, which matters when supplementary characters are used.
When this method returns, contains an address of the block of text as an array of characters to be retrieved from the text analysis.

When this method returns, contains the number of UTF16 units of the retrieved chunk. The returned length is not the length of the block, but the length remaining in the block, from the specified position until its end. For example, querying for a position that is 75 positions into a 100-position block would return 25.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteTextAnalysisSource.GetTextBeforePosition
member.summary: Gets a block of text immediately preceding the specified position.
member.param: The position immediately after the last position of the block of text to obtain.

When this method returns, contains an address of a pointer to the block of text, as an array of characters from the specified range. The text range will be from textPosition to the front of the block.
Number of UTF16 units of the retrieved block. The length returned is from the specified position to the front of the block.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteTextAnalysisSource
member.summary: Implemented by the text analyzer's client to provide text to the analyzer. It allows the separation between the logical view of text as a continuous stream of characters identifiable by unique text positions, and the actual memory layout of potentially discrete blocks of text in the client's backing store.
